# Verify no groups show up when fresh

| code-is         | 200                                  |         |
| header-like     | Cache-Control                        | private |
| json-parse      |                                      |         |

# Create a new group, make sure it shows up

| set               | group_name     | group%%start_time%%                    |              |
| create-group      | %%group_name%% | %%account%%                            | %%username%% |
